EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional recognition social post has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team
_________________________
{!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_Last_Name__c} wants to say THANK YOU! {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} was named a {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c} {!Fulfillment__c.Associated_With__c} thanks in part to feedback from people like you.
Client feedback is central to the Five Star Professional Award and {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}'s professional pride. If you've had a Five Star experience working with {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}, please offer up your recognition, too! Leave a comment on the social post linked below or fire off an email to spread the cheer!
{!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c} (Copy and paste the link into your browser)
Congratulations once again to {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c} and all of our {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} Five Star award winners!
Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
